about_the_game:
Legacy of Sin blood oath: Digital Art collection is the definitive collection of the behind-the-scenes materials that were used to create this game!

The package includes:
All animation frames used in the game.
Character concepts, artistic design and templates sheets.
Level concepts and background artwork.
Wallpapers.
Videos and promotional artwork for the game.
